skills.description: Ability Cost decreased by [3/6/9%].

skills.name: Cyber leech
skills.description: Launch an area attack, slightly damaging enemies within range and applying [Bleed]. For each enemy affected, you gain 4 binary.

skills.name: Packet Injection
skills.description: Throw a corrupted data packet, damaging the target. Upon a successful kill, restore [20 Binary].

skills.name: Trojan Rifle
skills.description: Shoot your rifle to deal damage and apply [Trojan] to the target. It will take an even greater hit after 3 second delay.

skills.name: Hackaton
skills.description: Upon use, abilities have a [20%/30%/40%] to get a [Concentration] that boosts your Critical Chance by [1%] and Damage by [5%].

skills.name: Code Rush
skills.description: Prepare to launch a surprise attack, activating [Shroud]: you will take less damage and move faster, and [Sucker Punch]: all attacks deal critical damage for 3 seconds.

1.value: . take 3% less damage and move 4% faster

skills.name: Blood Music
skills.description: Gain [Sprint] to move faster and a stack of [Concentration] that boosts your Critical Chance and Damage.

1.value: Increase critical damage by 5% and critical chance by 1%

2.value: Increase critical damage by 10% and critical chance by 2%

3.value: Increase critical damage by 15% and critical chance by 3%

4.value: Increase critical damage by 20% and critical chance by 4%

5.value: Increase critical damage by 25% and critical chance by 5%

skills.name: Bioflow

skills.description: Fire a projectile that deals damage and applies [Electrified] to enemies, dealing damage for 5 sec. and weakening their attacks by [5%].

skills.name: Counter-Strike
skills.description:
Reduce all incoming damage at the cost of Moving Speed, activating [Iron Wall]. 
Use the ability a second time to activate [Retaliation], boosting your Weapon Damage.

1.value: All incoming damage is reduced by 40%, Movement speed decreased by 75%.

2.value: All incoming damage is reduced by 42%

3.value: All incoming damage is reduced by 44%

4.value: All incoming damage is reduced by 46%

5.value: All incoming damage is reduced by 48%
